name: ccbuild
description: This package provides a thin layer for the Google Closure Compiler package that allows additional configuration such as compilation units and inheritance of configuration files. The offered functionality is a VERY LIGHTWEIGHT make system for Node.js.

1.0.1.name: ccbuild
1.0.1.description: This package provides a thin layer for the Google Closure Compiler package that allows additional configuration such as compilation units and inheritance of configuration files. The offered functionality is a VERY LIGHTWEIGHT make system for Node.js.

scripts.lint_js: if [ $(find src/ -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ] || [ $(find test/ -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then jscs --config src/.jscsrc src/ test/; fi
scripts.generate_doc: npm run clean && jsdoc --configure doc/.jsdocrc src
scripts.clean: if [ -d doc/gen ]; then rm -rf doc/gen; fi
